channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winter storm packing snow and strong winds to descend on Great Lakes and Northeast
item.description: A wild winter storm is bringing strong winds, heavy snow and frigid temperatures to the Great Lakes and Northeast

item.title: Where are the wackiest New Year's Eve drops in the US?

item.title: Texas man accused of trying to aid Islamic State group is charged with international terrorism

item.title: US faith leaders supporting targeted immigrants brace for a tough year ahead
item.description: Faith leaders across the United States face challenges as they support anxious immigrants

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 11-19-34-48-53, Powerball: 21
